description: This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on those derived from flesh contaminated with XE037.  The results look promising but the procurement methods seem awfully vague...
This team logbook details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, focusing on those derived from various Earth fauna.  The team seems quite enthusiastic--if not eager--about their results.
This damaged team logbook lacks (deliberately?) any identifying information, but still contains useful information on several types of mutagen and their development.

This internal manual details several varieties of mutagenic experiments, as well as describing the protocols used to concentrate mutagens for quicker results.  The authors recommend that researchers ensure that their subjects are well-fed and in good health, as the concentrated serums draw heavily on subjects' bodies.
This sheaf of papers-dated two weeks before all this started-describes some new chemical formula, and its effects on human subjects.  It's stamped "APPROVED"...

name: standpipe maintenance log
description: This binder details the scheduled maintenance for several plumbing systems throughout the facility.  However, some of the log sheets seem to be filled with...a chemical formula?

This sheaf of papers-dated the day before you evacuated-describes a new chemical formula in detail and supplies instructions for its use as some sort of ...crowd-control catalyst?  That can't be right...
This binder of highly technical papers describes some new chemical formula, and its effects on human subjects.  It's stamped "APPROVED"....

This sheaf of papers (dated the day you left the shelter!) is a highly speculative proposal for focusing "PE065".  Scribbled notes throughout seem to think that it might work, but that there's no time.
